1328:1: tatra sarvāsu vihāragatāsu bodhisattvacaryāsu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ samyaktvaparigraho veditavyaḥ|
1328:8: prathama eva cittotpāde bodhisattvena sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ kalatrabhāvena parigṛhītaḥ|
1328:9: eṣāṃ mayā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ sarvākārahitasukhopasaṃhāraḥ karaṇīya iti|
1328:13: sa ca tasminparigrahe parigrahānurūpayā kriyayā bodhisattvānurūpayā pravartate|
1328:24: kālena ca kālaṃ vaiśeṣikeṇa lābhena priyavāditayā copavatsayati na caiṣu dāsadāsīsaṃjñāṃ karoti|
1328:26: rājyajane punā rājabhūto bodhisattvaḥ adaṇḍenāśastreṇa rājyaṃ kārayati|
1328:36: sa dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ samyak pariṣadaṃ parigṛhṇāti|
1328:40: sarvasmiṃśca parigrahe samacitto bhavati na pakṣapatitaḥ|
1328:41: na ca teṣāmantike dharmamātsaryaṃ karoti na cācāryamuṣṭim|
1328:43: kuśalakāmatayā tu svayaṃ kurvatāṃ na nivārayati teṣāmeva-puṇyasambhāropacayanimittam kālaṃ ca prāpya svayamevateṣāmupasthānaparicaryākartā bhavati|
1328:48: gambhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya kālena kālaṃ saṃprakāśayati|
1328:50: ātmanaścāntikāt teṣāmarthe āmiṣahetoradhikena vyāpāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati|
1328:53: vyādhitāṃścaitāṃ vimanaskaṃ vā sarvathā nābhyupekṣate vyādhipraśamāya daurmanasyāpagamāya|
1328:55: kālena ca kālaṃ teṣāṃ khedamanupraviśya yuktarūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
1328:58: taiśca saha tulyavṛttasamācāro bhavatyadhiko vā [na] nyūnaḥ|
1328:68: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ kālaṃ pariṣadupādānaṃ karoti|
1328:71: tatra ye mṛduke paripāke vyavasthitāḥ sattvāste bodhisattvasya dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante cireṇa kālena viśuiddhibhavyatayā|
1328:72: ye punarmadhye paripāke vyavasthitāste'dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante na cireṇa viśuddhibhavyatayā|
1328:73: ye punaḥ sattvā adhimātre paripāke vyavasthitāste bodhisattvasya caramamupādānamityucyante tasminneva janmani viśuddhibhavyatayā|
1328:75: yena parigraheṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ sattvān parigṛhītavantaḥ parigrahīṣyanti parigṛhṇanti vā|
1328:79: vyatikramavyavasthiteṣu sattveṣu yudi vā bādhanaṃ yadi vā'dhyupekṣaṇā bodhisattvasya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ kaṭukena ca prayogeṇa sattve samudācāraḥ svasya cāśayasya kleśārakṣāsambādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ|
1328:80: alpake ca deyadharme saṃvidyamāne bahūnāṃ yācakānāṃ sammukhībhāvo yācanāya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ|
1328:81: ekātmakasya cāsya bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣu vicitreṣūtpanneṣu sahāyībhāvayācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ|
1328:84: mūḍhaśaṭhakhaṭhuṃkeṣu sattveṣu dharmasya deśanā vādhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ|
1328:85: saṃsāre ca nityakālaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ saṃsārāparityāgaśca saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ|
1328:87: aviśuddhe cādhyāṣaye parairagrasya parama-priyasya vastuno yācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ nānādhibhinnamatānāṃ nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñaptikā adhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ|
1328:88: ātyantikaścāpramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kleśāśca sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prahātavya iti saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ|
1328:89: evaṃ saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptena bodhisattve kvacidgurulāghavaṃ lakṣayitvā tathaiva prayoktavyam kvacitpudgalapravicayaḥ karaṇīyaḥ|
1328:97: evaṃ samyak pratipakṣakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptisammukhībhāve'pi na viṣīdati samyakcātmānaṃ pariharati|
1328:98: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne parigrahapaṭalaṃ dvitīyam|
